info.title: Swaps API
info.description:
The Swaps API provides instant cross-chain swap and bridge functionality for decentralized applications.
It supports multiple virtual machines (EVM, Solana, Bitcoin) and various DEX protocols and bridge solutions.

get.description: Generates a transaction for cross-chain swaps, bridges, and calls. The action includes transaction data, routing information, and fee calculations for executing the requested operation.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The exact in or exact out amount of the swap


`swap-action`

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description:
Address to receive the swapped tokens

`swap-action`

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The EVM address of the target contract (20 bytes hex)

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: erc20Amount
parameters.description:
The amount of Erc20 being transferred

**Optional:** Use for calls requiring Erc20 transfers

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: erc20Spender
parameters.description:
The Erc20 spender requiring approval for the transaction call

**Optional:** Will default to the `to` address

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: bridgeIds
parameters.description:
Specific bridge protocols to use

**Optional:** Will default to all available protocols

parameters.name: refundTo
parameters.description:
Alternate address to receive refunds

**Optional:** Will default to the `sender`

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

value.name: AmountTooHighError
value.message: The specified amount is too high.
value.title: Amount too high

value.name: AmountTooLowError
value.message: The specified amount is too low.
value.title: Amount too low

value.name: CrossVmReceiverRequiredError
value.message: Receiver address is required for swaps across different VMs.
value.title: Receiver address required

value.name: ExcessiveFeeError
value.message: The inputted flat fee is too large (over 50% of tx input).
value.title: Excessive fee

value.name: InsufficientLiquidityError
value.message: There is insufficient liquidity to complete this transaction.
value.title: Insufficient liquidity

value.name: InvalidAddressError
value.message: The format of the specified address is invalid.
value.title: Invalid address format

value.name: InvalidAmountZeroError
value.message: Amount must be greater than zero.
value.title: Zero amount not allowed

value.name: InvalidDstTokenError
value.message: Destination token is required.
value.title: Invalid destination token

value.name: InvalidParameterError
value.message: The request contains an invalid parameter.
value.title: Invalid parameter

details.reason: Slippage must be between 0 and 10000 bps

value.name: InvalidSrcTokenError
value.message: Source token is required.
value.title: Invalid source token

value.name: MissingRequiredFieldError
value.message: The request is missing a required field.
value.title: Missing required field

details.context: Source token address is required for swap actions

value.name: NoAvailableRouteError
value.message: No route is available for the specified parameters.
value.title: No available route

value.name: UnsupportedNetworkError
value.message: The network with the specified chainId is not supported.
value.title: Unsupported network

value.name: UnsupportedNetworkPairError
value.message: Routing between the specified networks is not supported.
value.title: Unsupported network pair

value.name: UnsupportedNetworkAndTokenPairError
value.message: Routing between the specified tokens and networks is not supported.
value.title: Unsupported network and token pair

value.name: UnsupportedSwapDirectionError
value.message: The specified swap direction is not supported.
value.title: Unsupported swap direction

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

value.name: InvalidApiKeyError
value.message: The provided API key is invalid.
value.title: Invalid API key

value.name: MissingApiKeyError
value.message: API key is required.
value.title: Missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied due to restrictions

value.name: GeoBlockingError
value.message: Access denied due to geo-blocking restrictions.
value.title: Geo-blocking restriction

details.reason: Country is on the blocked list

value.name: WalletScreeningError
value.message: Access denied due to wallet screening restrictions.
value.title: Wallet screening restriction

value.name: MethodNotAllowedError
value.message: The HTTP request method specified is not allowed.
value.title: Method not allowed

value.name: InternalServerError
value.message: An internal server error occurred while processing the request.
value.title: Internal server error

post.description: Register transactions for indexing. Mandatory for non EVM transactions.

get.description: Retrieve the status and details of a transaction by transaction hash or transaction ID

parameters.name: txHash
parameters.description: Transaction hash to query (required if txId not provided)

parameters.name: txId
parameters.description: Transaction ID to query (required if txHash not provided)

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Source chain ID for the transaction (optional but recommended)

get.description: Retrieve paginated transaction history with optional filtering

parameters.name: appIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of your app IDs. By default, a request to this endpoint will return transactions across all appIds in your org. Each API key has a unique app ID.  Multiple app IDs can exist within a single org ID.

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Wallet address to filter transactions by user

parameters.name: chainIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of chain IDs to filter by

get.description: Retrieves all available token paths across supported chains with configurable filtering options. Itâ€™s recommended to call this endpoint after selecting the source and destination tokens to validate route eligibility.

parameters.name: excludeBridgeIds
parameters.description: Bridge IDs to exclude from routing

parameters.name: excludeDexIds
parameters.description: DEX IDs to exclude from routing

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

get.description: Retrieve a list of supported chains, their names, and virtual machine identifiers. Raw data for the [supported chains list](/resources/chain-list)

amountIn.description: Expected amount to input (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountInMax.description: Maximum amount to input (inclusive of slippage)

amountOut.description: Expected amount delivered to users (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountOutMin.description: Minimum amount delivered to users (inclusive of slippage)

bridgeIds.description: Bridge IDs used in the route.

bridgeRoute.description: Bridge route information (src chain + token, dst chain + token, BridgeId)

requiresTokenApproval.description: Flag indicating whether the transaction object requires a source token approval check.

allRoutes.description: All available routes for the action.

amountIn.description: Expected amount to input (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountInMax.description: Maximum amount to input (inclusive of slippage)

amountOut.description: Expected amount delivered to users (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountOutMin.description: Minimum amount delivered to users (inclusive of slippage)

bridgeIds.description: Bridge IDs used in the route.

bridgeRoute.description: Bridge route information (src chain + token, dst chain + token, BridgeId)

ChainId.description: Chain ID. Find in the list of supported networks

value.description: Value in wei as string with 'n' suffix (bigint serialized)
Value as string with 'n' suffix (bigint serialized)

isNative.description: Boolean flag for whether token is the chain's gas token.

message.example: The format of the specified address is invalid.

code.description: Error type code for programmatic handling

details.description: Additional context about the error, including invalid values and suggestions

minAmount.description:
Minimum amount of source token (Alt VM only) for exact-out swaps. 
 `null` if no min.

maxAmount.description:
Maximum amount of source token (Alt VM only) for exact-out swaps. 
 `null` if no max.

minAmount.description:
Minimum amount of source token required for exact-in swaps. 
 `null` if no min.

maxAmount.description:
Maximum amount of source token for exact-in swaps. 
 `null` if no max.

tokens.description:
Available destination tokens for given source token 
 `all` indicates all tokens on destination chain are eligible

timestamp.description: Response timestamp (ISO string) for cache validation

chainId.description: Chain ID where the transaction occurred

success.description: Whether the transaction registration was successful

bridgeTime.description: Bridge time in seconds (null if not a bridge)

nextBridge.description: Bridge type for the next hop

amount.description: The exact in or exact out amount of the swap

recipient.description: Address to receive the swapped tokens

to.description: The EVM address of the target contract (20 bytes hex)

erc20Amount.description: The amount of Erc20 being transferred

erc20Spender.description: The Erc20 spender requiring approval for the transaction call
